Title: Relates to requiring a report on the delivery of integrated service providers statewide
Summary: Requires the office of mental health in consultation with the department of health, the office for people with developmental disabilities, and the office of addiction services and supports to prepare and issue a report bi-annually regarding integrated service providers statewide.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring a report on the delivery of integrated service providers statewide
